definitions.definition: an object or set of objects wrapped in paper, usually in order to be sent by post:
examples: The courier has just delivered a package for you.

definitions.definition: a small paper or plastic container in which a number of small objects are sold:
to put goods into boxes or containers to be sold:
examples: These organic olives are packaged in recycled glass containers.

definitions.definition: to sell several things together as a single product:
examples: The program comes packaged with some games.

definitions.definition: to show someone or something in a particular, usually attractive, way:
examples: As a young film star, she was packaged as a sex symbol.
